uid.description: Integer UID of the population in the Gene Pool.

population_hash.description: SHA256 of the population configuration settings.

git_path.description: The folder in which to find/clone the git repo.

git_repo_url.description: The Git repo URL in which to find the fitness function definition.

git_hash.description: SHA256 or SHA1 (in the LSB's) of the git commit to pull.

git_hash_sha256.description: True if git_hash is an SHA256. False if git_hash is SHA1.

verified.description: True if the fitness function has been verified as safe by Erasmus. NB: This is not a guarantee.

worker_id.description: The ID of the worker that created the population.

active_size.description: Number of individuals to create and/or evolve by default in each epoch (can be overridden by the active flag).

inputs.description: JSON list of valid EP_TYPE_STRs defining the target individuals inputs.

outputs.description: JSON list of valid EP_TYPE_STRs defining the target individuals outputs.

ordered_interface_hash.description: The ordered interface hash. Is used to verify all individuals meet the population interface requirements.

created.description: The time at which the population entry was created.

updated.description: The UTC date and time user defined fields not used by Erasmus were updated.

preload_import.description: 'import <git_repo>.<preload_import> as preload_function' must be valid python.

fitness_import.description: 'import <git_repo>.<fitness_import> as fitness_function' must be valid python.

survivability_import.description: 'import <git_repo>.<survivability_import> as survivability_function' must be valid python.
